articles.author: Richard Lawler
articles.title: Google calls Gemma 3 the most powerful AI model you can run on one GPU - The Verge
articles.description: Google’s Gemma 3 AI models are “open” versions of the technology behind its Gemini AI, which it says can outperform competition from DeepSeek, Meta, and OpenAI.
articles.content:
The new open AI models from Gemma can interpret images and short videos in addition to text.
The new open AI models from Gemma can interpret images and short videos in addition to text.
